title: Refugee Survival Trust
subtitle: What is #destitution? According to @jrf_uk it means going without the bare essentials we all need - a home, food, heating, lighting, clothing, shoes and basic toiletries. Find out what destitution means for #AsylumSeekers and #Refugees in #Scotland at http://rst.org.uk/what-we-do pic.twitter.com/1RvhQXfNw5
